Dgame.Audio.Sound



struct Channel;
Channel struct which stores the channel information.

enum Type: ubyte;
The channel type. Mono or Stereo.

Mono
Channel type is Mono

Stereo
Channel type is Stereo

ubyte bits;
How many bits has this channel

Type type;
Which type is this channel

this(ubyte bits, Type type);
CTor

void opCall(ubyte bits, Type type);
Short set function.

Example:
Channel ch;
ch(8, Channel.Type.Stereo); // set bits and type for this channel.


class Sound;
Sound represents the functionality to manipulate loaded sounds. That means with this class you can get informations about the sound or you can play, stop or pause it.

Author:
rschuett

enum Status: ubyte;
Represents the current status.

None
No information

Stopped
Sound is stopped

Paused
Sound is paused

Playing
Sound is playing

final this();
CTor

final this(BaseSoundFile soundfile);
CTor

final this(string filename);
CTor

final void free();
Free / Release the source and buffer of the Sound

static Sound loadOnce(BaseSoundFile soundfile);
Load a soundfile and stores the sound object in a static field. Then returns the sound object. If you try to load the same file on more time, you get the same sound object as before.

static Sound loadOnce(string filename);
Load a soundfile from his path and stores the sound object in a static field. Then returns the sound object. If you try to load the same file on more time, you get the same sound object as before.

final void loadFromFile(BaseSoundFile soundfile);
Load from a soundfile.

Example:
Sound s1 = new Sound();
s1.loadFromFile(new VorbisFile("samples/audio/orchestral.ogg"));


See:
BaseSoundFile

See:
VorbisFile

See:
WaveFile

final BaseSoundFile loadFromFile(string filename);
Load a soundfile from his path.

Example:
Sound s1 = new Sound();
if (s1.loadFromFile("samples/audio/orchestral.ogg") is null)
throw new Exception("Could not load file.");

final void loadFromMemory(const void* buffer, uint dataSize, uint frequency, ref const Channel ch);
Load from memory.

final pure nothrow BaseSoundFile getSoundFile();
Returns the interal Soundfile which contains the filename, the music type and the length in seconds.

final const pure nothrow string getFilename();
Returns the current filename.

final const pure nothrow float getLength();
Returns the length in seconds.

final const pure nothrow MusicType getType();
Returns the music type.

final const pure nothrow ALenum getFormat();
Returns the Format.

final const pure nothrow Status getStatus();
Returns the current status.

Returns the current Channel.

Returns the current frequency.

final void setVolume(float volume);
Set the volume.

final void setVolume(ubyte volume);
Set the volume.

final const pure nothrow ubyte getVolume();
Returns the current volume.

final void setLooping(bool enable);
Enable looping.

final const pure nothrow bool getLooping();
Returns if the looping is enabled or not.

final void play(bool enable);
Activate the playing. If enable is true, the looping is also activated.

final void play();
Activate the playing.

final void stop();
Stop current playing.

final void rewind();
Rewind playing.

final void pause();
Pause playing.

Set the position.

final void setPosition(float x, float y, float z = 0);
Set the position.
